title: Inflation rate in South Sudan 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
Inflation rate compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019.
The line drastically decreased by 3.4 times from Year 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 83.49 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 24.47 was reported at Year 2019
min_summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
Inflation rate compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019.
